component.name: Tuhi
Tuhi
Tuhi
Tuhi
component.summary: Utility to download drawings from the Wacom Ink range of devices
Wacom Ink cihazlarınızdan çizimlerinizi indirmek için bir araç
Narzędzie do pobierania rysunków z rodziny urządzeń Wacom Ink
Utilità per scaricare i disegni dalla gamma Inchiostro di dispositivi Wacom

description.p: Tuhi is a graphical user interface to download drawings stored on tablet devices from the Wacom Ink range, e.g. Intuos Pro Paper or Bamboo Slate.
Tuhi requires Tuhi, the daemon to actually communicate with the devices. ThiGui is merely a front end to Tuhi, Tuhi must be installed and running when Tuhi is launched.
Tuhi è un'interfaccia utente grafica per scaricare disegni archiviati su tablet dispositivi della gamma di Inchiostro Wacom, ad esempio Intuos Pro Paper o Bamboo Slate.
Tuhi to graficzny interfejs użytkownika do pobierania rysunków przechowywanych na tabletach z rodziny Wacom Ink, np. Intuos Pro Paper i Bamboo Slate.
TuhiGUI wymaga Tuhi, usługi komunikującej się z urządzeniem. TuhiGUI to interfejs dla usługi Tuhi, która musi być zainstalowana i uruchomiona, aby narzędzie Tuhi mogło działać.
Tuhi, Wacom Ink serisi cihazlarda depolanan çizimlerinizi indirmenize olanak sağlayan bir grafik kullanıcı arayüzüdür. Ör. Intuos Pro Paper veya Bamboo Slate.
